metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17531 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
gozilla.c in GNU GLOBAL 4.8.6 does not validate strings before launching the program specified by the BROWSER environment variable, which might allow remote attackers to conduct argument-injection attacks via a crafted URL.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-17531` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

global - 6.6.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: global package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.6.2-1').
